resources.string: One day, Rachel had her two best friends over for a play date. When it came time for a snack, her mom asked her to find out what everyone wanted. Rachel was happy to help because she loved playing hostess. However, when Rachel got back to her mom, she couldn\'t quite remember everything. Can you help her figure it out?
Three girls all got dates on the same day. From their texts, can you figure out which girl went with which guy and where they went on their dates.
